description: In a forest clearing, a group of animals including a moose, bears, a wolf, deer, and a rabbit are gathered, seemingly listening to something. A moose sits on a stump, appearing to be the one providing the audio entertainment. The other animals display expressions ranging from attentive curiosity to outright amusement, with a rabbit rolling on the ground laughing. This scene presents a darkly humorous and absurd inversion, depicting wildlife finding entertainment in the sounds of human distress. It highlights a surreal dynamic where the natural world is detached and entertained by the struggles of humanity within its domain.
caption: "Wait! Wait! Here's another one—the screams of a man lost in the woods."
